Assignment.AssignmentText:
Hello! For this assignment, you will be creating a basic website structure using HTML and CSS. Your website should contain the following elements:
1. Menus - Create a navigation menu that allows the user to easily navigate your website. This menu should be located at the top of your website and should contain links to all of the major sections of your website.
2. Footers - Create a footer that contains information about your website. This footer should be located at the bottom of your website and should contain links to your social media profiles, contact information, and any other relevant information.
3. Sections - Create separate sections for each of the major topics on your website. These sections should be clearly labeled and should contain all of the information related to that topic.
4. CSS Classes and IDs - Use CSS classes and IDs to style your website. This will allow you to easily make changes to the appearance of your website without having to modify each individual element.
5. FLEX and/or GRID Design Patterns - Use FLEX and/or GRID design patterns to create a responsive layout for your website. This will ensure that your website looks good on all devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
To complete this assignment, you will need to have a good understanding of HTML and CSS. You can find resources and tutorials on these topics by following these links:
HTML: https://www.w3schools.com/html/ CSS: https://www.w3schools.com/css/
Once you have completed your website, make sure to test it on different devices and browsers to ensure that it looks good and functions properly. Good luck!

Config.Reqs: Menus, Footers, Sections, css classes en ids, FLEX en/of GRID design patterns
Config.Title: Algemene Structuur
